title: Kelvin Fletcher flashes his pants as he gets physiotherapy ahead of Strictly live show
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kelvin Fletcher has become the official pin-up of Strictly Come Dancing 2019 and has delighted fans with his latest post.

The Emmerdale star, 35, took to his Instagram stories to give his followers a glimpse at his prep for tonight's live show.

And he couldn't resist giving a cheeky flash of his underwear in the process.

He hit the studio early, saying: "Morning guys, just arrived at the Strictly studio for a band run today, so it's the first time on a Saturday morning we hear the band play the music.

"All week we're listening to tracks and we get two runs with a band."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

He had a 20 minute warm up before their first run, later doing the dress rehearsal and standing by to go live.

Later he posted himself lying on a bed getting ready for physiotherapy before taking to the dancefloor.

As Rack City by Tyga played, Kelvin moved in the camera down to his body, showing his striped pants and trainer socks.

(Image: PA)

He captioned the pic: "Pre show physio."

Kelvin and his dancing partner Oti Mabuse will be dancing the cha cha cha to Get Stupid by Aston Merrygold in tonight's show.

He has wowed fans of the BBC contest after being drafted in as a replacement for injured Made in Chelsea star Jamie Laing.

(Image: BBC)

The soap star is already favourite to win, after wowing with his high-energy routines and hip action.

His bum-shaking samba in week one won him legions of female fans.

Can he pull it off in week five?

*Strictly airs tonight at 6.40pm on BBC One
description: The Emmerdale star, 35, is preparing for another Strictly live show tonight with his dancing partner Oti Mabuse
